title: Chatter Natter 2: Carole Hope
itunes:title: Chatter Natter 2: Carole Hope
itunes:subtitle: In the second special Chatter Natter episode, Pete and Gary talk to historian Carole Hope. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Guest: Carole Hope Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or subscribe to...
description:
In the second special Chatter Natter episode, Pete and Gary talk to historian Carole Hope.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Guest: Carole Hope Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
